publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3298 Mr David Davidson: Edinburgh Military Tattoo 2002â€”That the Parliament recognises the role of the Edinburgh Military Tattoo in promoting Scottish history, tradition and pageantry and congratulates the board, staff and performers in creating a fantastic spectacle for the Queen's Jubilee Tattoo which is a complete sell-out, contributing greatly to Scottish tourism.
S1M-3298 Edinburgh Military Tattoo 2002 (lodged on 2 August 2002) Phil Gallie*
S1M-3298 Edinburgh Military Tattoo 2002 (lodged on 2 August 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3298 Edinburgh Military Tattoo 2002 (lodged on 2 August 2002) Karen Gillon*
S1M-3298 Edinburgh Military Tattoo 2002 (lodged on 2 August 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
